title: Poster, "Victoria and Albert Musuem for London Underground", 1921
signed: Signed in burgundy ink, upper right: EDWARD / McKNIGHT / KAUFFER / 1921
inscribed: Printed in burgundy ink, lower left: 1056. 1000 20-9-22; lower right: ELECTRIC RAILWAY HOUSE, BROADWAY, WESTMINSTER. S.W.I.
provenance: Mrs. Edward McKnight Kauffer; 1963: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: On black ground, framed with burgundy, blue and light green, a statue of Kuan Yin outlined in blue and green, standing on a starburst. Above, upper left: UNDERGROUND. Above: KUAN-YIN. Below: VICTORIA & ALBERT / MUSEUM / SOUTH / KENSINGTON. Lower margin: ADMISSION FREE / OPEN WEEKDAYS 10-0 am till 5-0pm. / SUNDAYS 2-30pm till 6-0pm. / NEAREST STATIONS / BROMPTON ROAD AND / SOUTH KENSINGTON.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "Victoria and Albert Musuem for London Underground", 1921.Offset lithograph on paper, lined. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-20.
